profileAlternative.name: Vipul Munot
profileAlternative.headline: Data Scientist
profileAlternative.summary:
A dynamic 3 plus years of experience with hand-in-hand responsibilities of web development, Report development, Migration, Manual Testing and Cognos administration.
I recently graduation from Indiana University Bloomington with a Master of Science in Data Science.I am mainly interested in analyzing and developing solutions for real life problems.
Through my courses here at IUB, I have gained experience on how to tackle the unstructured nature of language in the form of text and dialogues and build models and parser around them so that the raw text can be used for making informative models.
I am
- Result oriented and believe in smart work.
- Patient, adaptable and dedicated.
- Outstanding ability to multitask and work in a fast paced environment.
- Ability to work efficiently both independently and within a group.
- Skilled to analyze process and resolve issues.

given.text: Hi, working with Vipul was always an pleasant experience, He is diligent, committed and focused. The thing I liked the most about Vipul was his ability to take critique and feedback effectively which in turn allowed us to collaborate and come with really unique and interesting solutions.

Vipul M is a creative professional that works within deadlines finding solutions to any kind of issues. He is independently motivated,detail oriented, and works well with a team. I highly recommend him for an addition to your project, team or company.

received.text:
I’ve had the privilege of working with Chetan for little more than 18 months and in that time I have known Chetan to be a well-grounded and down to earth colleague. He is pragmatic leader and realist who seems to grasp ideas holistically whilst still taking note to the more acute details. I found this to be incredibly valuable in working with him. He is an hard worker and value creator in the truest sense.

... See more

items: Finding Optimal Features for Credit Analysis

profile.name: Vipul Munot
profile.headline: Data Scientist
profile.summary:
A dynamic 3 plus years of experience with hand-in-hand responsibilities of web development, Report development, Migration, Manual Testing and Cognos administration.
I recently graduation from Indiana University Bloomington with a Master of Science in Data Science.I am mainly interested in analyzing and developing solutions for real life problems.
Through my courses here at IUB, I have gained experience on how to tackle the unstructured nature of language in the form of text and dialogues and build models and parser around them so that the raw text can be used for making informative models.
I am
- Result oriented and believe in smart work.
- Patient, adaptable and dedicated.
- Outstanding ability to multitask and work in a fast paced environment.
- Ability to work efficiently both independently and within a group.
- Skilled to analyze process and resolve issues.
